name: micro-frontend-spa
description: A complete micro-frontend project based on Single-SPA architecture

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:root" "npm run start:app1" "npm run start:app2" "npm run start:app3"
scripts.build: npm run build:root && npm run build:app1 && npm run build:app2 && npm run build:app3
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd root && npm install && cd ../apps/app1 && npm install && cd ../app2 && npm install && cd ../app3 && npm install && cd ../../packages/shared && npm install && cd ../utils && npm install
